content.label: Great game, but broken again. Come back soon!!
Great game but very unstable.  Even before the latest update you had to reinstall every few days.
Again, another update that rather than fixing breaks the app.  I longer won't connect.

With the new update we now have notifications again, however after restoring my purchases the game crashed when I tried to open it every time. I re-installed it, didn't lose any of my current games and now runs perfectly.

title.label: This update broke the app on my phone :(

content.label: Won't even open now.

I'm on iOS 10 and the app won't connect to the Game Center. I keep it open for 10+ minutes but it just refuses to connect. Other games work fine. This problem has persisted through multiple game and ios updates.
One of the few iOS games that I've been playing regularly. No reason to not try it since it's free! When you enjoy it, give them a few of your coin... they deserve it!

title.label: One of the best games in the App Store!

content.label: Also one of the most challenging.  I've been playing for over a year and still get humbled all the time. With endless combinations of players and moves it's like chess on steroids!  So fun! So hard! You will find yourself thinking about it when you aren't playing:-)
If you like chess you'll like this
Give it a shot, it's fun

title.label: Great Strategy Game. Clean and Simple

content.label:
I've been playing this game a few years now and I think it's perfect for an iPhone strategy game. This is a game I'll keep playing as long as there are people to play against.

I know the devs have moved  on but I would love to see some more strategy games like this come from them or even see them re pick up the game and add more content.

Update: Still one of the best games available! Still feels fresh and the community is still around. Can't wait for more from onemanleft! 

This game is simple like checkers but deep like chess. I learn something new every match. I am officially addicted. I haven't been this hooked on something since FF tactics. Please support this game so we can keep playing forever! Über pack FTW!

title.label: One of the best strategy games!

content.label: Don't let the game art fool you, this game is a very serious strategy that's tons of fun and it adds its own twist to turn base strategy and for the better. The best part about this game is the online play, were you can play anyone and games can last a short time or grind out into a long battle. I highly recommend you give this game a try if you are a fan of turn base strategy!
That's all I can say about this game (^^,)

title.label: Chess evolved: the best turn-based strategy game for mobile

content.label: This game is perfect, my only wish is that more teams and maps were released!

title.label: The only app game that deserves your money

content.label: This is the only legitimate app game I've ever played. In a sea of time-wasters, hoarders, grinds, and pay-to-win "games", this is simply an elegant, deep, worthwhile strategy game that will never get old.  I gladly paid simply to support these developers.  Thanks a lot guys!
This game is really fun! Keeps me coming back for more! A+++

title.label: The only game I play on mobile

content.label: Outwitter's only short coming is it's small, although pleasant, community which still stands three years after the height of it's release. Regardless, online play sparkles. This is a phenomenal, balanced chess-like game with move management on a per turn basis. The mechanics give way to a few quirks newcomers might struggle with initially but matchmaking offers an appropriate handicap and the game design itself is very simple. Every win is challenging, every loss devastating. Absolutely fantastic.

I love this game I will play it as long as I can, this is a great game! I have never bought any in app stuff for any other game but this one has earned my money.  This could easily be remade in to a Star Wars theme, Potter theme any movie could take these mechanics and make an awesome game. I really wish it was being updated better

title.label: Best game on the IOS App Store

content.label: Awesome! Very fun and challenging game.
This game is great for any mobile TBS gamers, or anyone who wants to play a quick game with a buddy. Definitely suggest trying it, you can have any number of pass'n'play games without spending money.

I love this game! I wish they would add more to it though, but there's still a ton to do and enjoy!
Great sit-down-with-a-friend-and-play type of game

But yes it crashes all the time and seems to be getting worse. On the upside, sometimes the net effect is a "do-over" which can be handy. But mostly it's annoying. I still play though, for going on 4 years maybe. This is one of the best games ever made. Please fix it!

title.label: Good Game, Could Be Great Though

content.label:
Excellent game play, I don't think that I've played a mobile game this much since Clash of Clans.   

It could be more user friendly. It looks like it was made 4-5 years ago and apps have come a long way since then. It occasionally crashes on my iPhone 6 Plus. Load times are longer than average for an app nowadays. Notifications are on and off. It doesn't always let me know when an opponent has played me. 

Overall it's a good game though. I would definitely recommend it.
Lots of fun. Kind of like chess.
It won't let me restore previous in game purchases... Now I don't want to repurchase and don't want to play with ads... Come on Outwitters help me!
I faced a player who had profanity, misspelt but still obvious what it was meant to say, and used the chat to curse at me

title.label: Best app game I've ever played

content.label: Addictive and thought provoking turn-based strategy game. After playing for several years, I am still learning. If you are a competitive person and enjoy challenging yourself intellectually, you may get addicted to this game. The community of players is also great.

A simple game, yet extremely enjoyable with a lot of variation.  Each team offers a unique ability and each map will affect your tactics.  I could not be happier with the on-line community and support.  5 stars all the way.
Best turn based strategy game out there, and I really like that it doesn't nickle and dime you. It's like a classic board game like chess, but more fun.
This game is excellent. Mind bending strategy. I've been playing for 3 years daily. Love it. Developers are great!

I have been playing this game for literally years. It is such a great strategy game that never gets old. With rankings that get you interested, you're always playing against folks who are the same difficulty level as you.

I have played this game for awhile and have always found it appealing. Strategy, tournaments, rankings, various formats of competition, forums, the rules of play...it has all the requirements of a basic gamer needs.
Despite the unreliable notifications, I love this game and can't rate it lower than 5.

The game seems fun, but I can't actually confirm this first impression because the game won't allow me to play, saying that I need to be connected to internet, though I am, beyond doubt, connected to a strong network.
It's like a chess board meets tower defense, turn based strategy. It's a great and challenging game, great ranking system and just in general a lot of fun. Must have for anyone who likes competition.
Been playing for years, still hasn't gotten old. A must for any strategy lover
Excellent game! A lot of fun! People need to pay for the upgrade to keep this game alive. If you like it, help support it.

title.label: A lot of fun when you can play

content.label: Really fun game! So much potential. You are limited to 3 games at a time unless you pay. People have 4 days to play back which is way too long. Also the game is not updating consistently so even when people take 4+ days, they don't lose and you can't start a new game.

Great game, when I can play. Crashes all the time on ipad.
Still no fix. Game crashes AFTER I make moves then I need to redo them
Amazing strategy and very well built game. Only one suggestion- PLEASE create an undo button for mistakes! Mistakes are terrible and should be allowed to take one move back while still you turn!!!

By far the greatest strategy game in existence, and possibly my favorite game overall. Every aspect of the game is incredibly balanced, interesting, and exciting. I've had so much fun playing this infinitely replayable game, and will definitely playing for as long as I have a device to play it on.

title.label: Head to head turn based masterpiece

content.label: If you are looking for this type of game, then do yourself a favor and download it.  Simple, stable, and lots of fun. Great game to play with friends and family on a daily basis.
I love this strategy game!! Play with others, or teach your kids.
Very strategic, thought-inspiring

title.label: Game is a blast. But crashes a lot

content.label:
This game is turn based and a lot of fun. I really enjoy it. But please fix the crashes after every game. At the end of every turn the game crashes to desktop and I have to restart the appl. Very annoying.
6/22/16-FIX THE CRASHES!!!!!! I can't take it anymore!
Now crashes constantly. Unplayable
I was first a little skeptical about this game, but when I first played it I instantly fell in love with the game. This is a great strategy game that I could play for hours! 💯💯💯

title.label: I am really enjoying this game.

content.label: I like it better than Hero Academy and for me that is saying a lot.
This game is amazingly fun and well put together but it gets 4 stars simply because there hasn't been any new additions or updates for a year....
